titleStmt.title: The Kings Majesties propositions to the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament; concerning His Majesties comming to White-Hall, and giving his royall assent for setling of the Presbyteriall government, within the kingdome of England, and dominion of VVales. Also, His Majesties desires, concerning the liturgie of the Church of England, and episcopacie. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Fornace, W.

titleStmt.title: The Kings Majesties propositions to the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament; concerning His Majesties comming to White-Hall, and giving his royall assent for setling of the Presbyteriall government, within the kingdome of England, and dominion of VVales. Also, His Majesties desires, concerning the liturgie of the Church of England, and episcopacie. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Fornace, W.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: Not in fact by Charles I; a letter, dated and signed at end: Holmby-house, Feb, 19 W. Fornace.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "1646"; the 7 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
